settings.heading: Does Inkkas offer Free Shipping?
settings.content:
• Yes, Inkkas is happy to offer FREE shipping within the Continental U.S.A. on all orders of $175 or more! 
  • FREE shipping is automatically applied at checkout wherever eligible.
  • FREE shipping is also available to Canada for orders of $200 or more. 
  • Free shipping does not currently apply to Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico. 
  • Free shipping does not currently apply to international orders other than Canada.

settings.heading: Where does Inkkas ship?
settings.content:
Inkkas ships worldwide!

  • via USPS and UPS for domestic orders
  • via DHL Express Worldwide for non-Canada international orders
  • via USPS Priority International for Canada orders

settings.heading: How long does it take for an order to arrive?
settings.content:
Depending on which shipping method is selected, domestic orders usually arrive between 2-10 business days from the order date. Note that all orders are processed for shipping the business day after placement. 

Continental USA shipping options:

  • Expedited UPS 2-Day Air usually takes 2-4 business days to arrive to the destination
  • Standard USPS Ground: 4-7 business days
  • No-Rush USPS Ground: 7-10 business days

Pre-Orders: Items that are available for pre-order will be indicated as pre-order BEFORE you make a purchase and will indicate an estimated shipping date on the product page.

International: International orders typically take between 14 - 20 business days to arrive, as our shipping center is located in the US.

settings.heading: Is expedited shipping available?
settings.content:
Yes, Inkkas offer expedited UPS 2-Day Air options in addition to USPS ground options (no-rush and standard)!

  • Wherever eligible, these options will appear at checkout.
  • Note that all orders are processed the business day after placement.

settings.heading: Do I have to add shipping to the price?
settings.content:
• We automatically add shipping to your total cost during the checkout process, once you select the shipping method you prefer.
  • FREE shipping on domestic orders of $175+ is also automatically applied wherever eligible.

settings.heading: What are shipping rates for International Orders?
settings.content:
• DHL Express Worldwide rates vary widely depending upon the country where the items are being shipped. The best way to find a shipping quote for an international order is to use the shipping calculator during checkout.
  • Note that international orders shipping via DHL are not eligible for free shipping discounts. 
  • Please allow an extra business day for customs paperwork processing when ordering internationally. 
  • Note Inkkas is not liable for any customs duties and taxes on outbound shipment to international customers. Customs duties taxes are the sole responsibility of the recipient.

settings.heading: Will I receive a tracking number once I order a pair of Inkkas?
settings.content: Yes, you will be sent an automatic email with a tracking number once your order ships. The tracking number will enable you to track the shipment from our fulfillment center to its destination.

settings.heading: My shoes are on pre-order. How do I know when they will ship?
settings.content:
• If your item is on pre-order, the product page will show the estimated shipping date at the time of your order.
  • Once your order has shipped, you will be notified via e-mail with a tracking number. 
  • If you have any questions about the status of your pre-order, please contact customer service at support@inkkas.com.
  • Note that we do our best to project accurate shipping dates for pre-orders on the product page; however, these dates could change.

settings.heading: I'm returning my order. Does Inkkas cover the cost of return shipping?
settings.content: Yes, Inkkas provides a FREE prepaid shipping label for items returned within 7 days of delivery. You may still return items for up to 30 days, less the cost of return shipping. View our full return policy here.

settings.heading: I have contacted Inkkas customer service, when will I hear back?
settings.content:
Inkkas support agents are available between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. We are committed to responding to inquiries within 24 to 48 hours during business hours. You can reach us at support@inkkas.com.  Please note that we do not respond to inquiries during weekends and/or holidays.

For urgent matters or if you haven't received a response from our customer service team in 48- 72 hours (sometimes replies go to spam), please email us at ops@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: My package got stolen or lost in the mail. What should I do?
settings.content: Oh no! If your package got lost or stolen in the mail please submit your claim here: https://inkkas.com/pages/navidium-protection-claim

settings.heading: My item arrived damaged or defective. How can I return it?
settings.content: Oh no! We apologize for this inconvenience. If your order was purchased within 30 days, please contact us at support@inkkas.com with your order number and details about the damage or defect.

settings.heading: What can I do with old Inkkas I no longer wear?
settings.content:
• Inkkas is always looking for ways to reduce waste, so we encourage all of our customers that are finished using a pair to donate them. Our partner organization that does a great job taking used shoes and repurposing them is Soles4Souls (https://soles4souls.org).
  • Please continue to support our mission of sustainable habits by donating your used shoes instead of throwing them in the trash. 
  • If you would like to donate your shoes to Soles4Souls, reach out to us for a FREE shipping label at support@inkkas.com.
